events.message: Customer reported a rear-end collision involving their vehicle on Main Street at 7:45 PM yesterday.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the insured’s car in a traffic collision.
An agent has been assigned to the case to handle customer communication and ensure smooth processing.
We acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that the process will proceed swiftly and fairly.
Request was made for the customer to submit a police report, photos of vehicle damages, and a copy of the driving license.
Customer submitted all requested documentation including police report and multiple images showing the damages sustained.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted materials and reached out to witnesses to confirm accident details.
Investigation concluded that the insured was not at fault and the evidence supports claim approval.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to compensate for all damages and associated repair costs.
The customer expressed satisfaction with how the insurance company handled the investigation and settlement process.
Official approval of the claim was granted following customer agreement to the proposed settlement terms.
Payment was disbursed to the insured’s bank account covering all approved damages and medical reimbursements.
The claim case was officially closed after confirming receipt of payment and final customer approval.
All case files and communications were archived for record-keeping and future reference if needed.
